resources.string: Notifications related to backup progress: import and export. They’re shown if you leave the screen/app while an import/export is in progress, or at the end of the process.
Shows an ongoing notification for importing in the background, and shows a notification when a background import finished. Without this, you can only use import while on the backup screen.
Shows an ongoing notification for exporting in the background, and shows a notification when a background export finished. Without this, you can only use export while on the backup screen.
Allow notifications to get notified when a backup operation continues or completes in the background.
Cancelling this operation may result in partial data transfer only. Are you sure you want to cancel?

You’re about to send your inventory to a third party. Once you leave the app there are no guarantees. For example, some apps (Google Drive, Dropbox) don’t allow cancelling this procedure. Once you started, be patient; give it a few minutes, if you have a large inventory. Even if the progress disappears, the export may still be ongoing in the background. \n\nDo you want to continue?

You’re about to import %1$s into your inventory. In case your inventory is not empty, conflicting details (image, description) of belongings will be ignored, but the best effort will be made to merge contents. \n\nDo you want to continue?
Backup operation is in progress, please wait until it is finished.
There were %3$d issues during importing %2$d/%1$d belongings.
Import cancelled, no modifications were done.
Failed to import belongings, invalid backup data: %s.
Property “%1$s” already exists, used existing one.
Room “%2$s” in “%1$s” already exists, used existing one.
Item “%3$s” in “%2$s” in “%1$s” already exists, used existing one.
“%1$s” has invalid type: “%2$s”, used the default type.
List “%1$s” has invalid or duplicate entry: id=%2$d, ignored.
